mapper.sql: car_owner_id, car_dealer_id, province_id, city_id, name, phone, address, card_no, birthday, buy_time, buy_car_models, status, sms_time
mapper.insert:
insert into car_owner
car_owner_id,
car_dealer_id,
province_id,
city_id,
name,
phone,
address,
card_no,
birthday,
buy_time,
buy_car_models,
status,
sms_time,
#{carOwnerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{carDealerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{provinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

#{buyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

mapper.update:
update car_owner
car_dealer_id = #{carDealerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
province_id = #{provinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
city_id = #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
card_no = #{cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
buy_time = #{buyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
buy_car_models = #{buyCarModels,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sms_time = #{smsTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where car_owner_id = #{carOwnerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from car_owner where status = 1
and car_dealer_id = #{carDealerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
order by 1 desc

select count(1) from car_owner where status = 1
and car_dealer_id = #{carDealerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select count(1) from car_owner where status = 1 and month(birthday) = month(curdate()) and day(birthday) between 1 and day(last_day(curdate()))
and car_dealer_id = #{carDealerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select count(1) from car_owner where status = 1 and month(birthday) = month(curdate()) and day(birthday) = = day(curdate())
and car_dealer_id = #{carDealerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
